location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of a number of John Wedderburn's letters (nos. 529 and 565 of 1823 from the General Department, and no. 272 of the same year from the Territorial Department), and states that the instructions which they contain will be attended to.
